programme.title: Jamie's Super Food S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: Jamie's Super Food is an exciting series where you can learn how to eat your way to a healthier life. Each week Jamie cooks up a day's worth of delicious meals - perfectly balanced plates of mouthwatering food that have all the good nutrition you need in a day.

programme.title: Make It Count S2 - EP 1
programme.desc: The season begins with a fun-filled, high-octane episode that brings you the Maths behind thrill rides. Joakim and Charlotte get wet and wild at Adventure Cove to show you how shapes is the key to making roller coasters safer, how the Queueing Theory can help you beat those time-wasting queues and how knowing speed, angle, weight and height can help you zip down water slides.

programme.title: Kody Kapow - EP 25
programme.desc: Kody Kapow is about an aspiring martial arts-style superhero named Kody who spends the summer with his extended family in a small village in China. His grandfather, a martial arts master, teaches Kody ancient lessons of mindfulness, patience and perseverance, which Kody employs as he and his super spy cousin Mei set off on adventures in the village together with their tiger friend Goji.

programme.title: Zoids WILD - EP 29

programme.title: Turning Mecard - EP 19
programme.desc: Jason loves the mystical minicars he hears so much about. One day, he meets Evan, a real living minicar that transforms into a creature called Mecanimal. Mecanimals are from a different world called Triforce, and have special powers to battle each other. Jason and Evan bond and realise they both need one another to find missing family members. Their quest will take them on an amazing adventure!

programme.title: Extreme Football - EP 17
programme.desc: Extreme Football is an urban spin off of traditional five-a-side incorporating elements of free running and acrobatics. Created by and for children, as soon as Samy discovers it he is determined to captain a team. He sets about recruiting his closest friend Greg and Mediterranean girl Ines as defenders, quick-witted Luna as the star striker and hyperactive Joey as goalkeeper. Together they form The Team.

programme.title: DinoCore - EP 0025 & 0026
programme.desc: "Baryon", the great Dino Master of Dino Star, is defeated by the evil "Darkno". Before he dies, he sends his three most trusted DinoCores: Tyranno, Saber and Stego, to Earth with the ancient guardian Dino Tuner. Many years after Baryon's defeat, a carefree boy named Rex comes across the Tuner and becomes the new Dino Master. Meanwhile, Darkno takes over one planet after another and finally reaches Earth.

programme.title: Me, Myself & Isaac! - EP 2
programme.desc: Instead of going for a charity drive organized by his best friend Suzy Q, Isaac sends Smarty in his place. Suzy Q is none the wiser of Isaac's plan until Smarty lets it slip that he's not who he really is. Meanwhile, Isaac and Sporty get themselves in a nasty encounter with a mean karangguni man who's taken their RC plane hostage.

What goes into producing the finest cattle? What is the best way to savor the delicacy? By the way, do you know Kobe beef has a rival in Japan?

What are the possible directions to take this campaign further? (重)《讲华语运动》今年欢庆40周年。几经变迁，这项运动走过哪些里程碑？它对华族新加坡人带来什么影响？近几年，运动也着重在亲子间创造一个使用华文华语的环境。未来，这项运动还能如何发展？.

programme.title: 哪吒 The Legends Of Ne Zha - EP 0009 & 0010
双子星 The Ultimatum - EP 0021 & 0022

Because Wen Yu's daughter was diagnosed with congenital heart disease, she kept silent about the mistake so that her daughter can receive the best medical care with Song Nian's wealth. (重)三十多年前，凤凰集团老板叶松年强暴了原已怀孕的郑文玉，满心怨恨的文玉遂故意让自己和对方二姨太同时出世的女儿－叶予晨、方宋乔身份对调。宋乔在文玉泄恨打骂之下，度过悲苦的童年；予晨长大后则在凤凰集团身居要职。.

Kaixin often thinks of Tietong and is surprised to find someone who looks exactly like his late senior. Kongli asks Baida, who is a hopeless gambler, to impersonate Tietong so as to keep Kaixin under his control. Kaixin falls for the sham and believes that Tietong has reincarnated. (重)二十年后，圆慧的胞弟紫薇真人高居当朝国师。开心小和尚从少林寺调到乌龙寺做主持，使该寺戒律院主管铁空又气又爱，更是搞得县衙门老爷、师爷头痛不已。街头混混百搭阴差阳错成了开心的铁桶师叔，麻烦接踵而来。.

programme.title: 星期二特写: 寻找新边际 Tuesday Report - The New Periphery - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) In the planning and construction of Sino-Singapore Guangzhou Knowledge City (SSGKC), Singaporeans brought in their management expertise which contributed to the Singaporean characteristics in this city. The Patent Examination Center has settled in, Hwa Chong International School from Singapore will also set foot there. The rapid development of SSGKC change the landscape and life of the surrounding area, what are its impacts on local people? What are their expectations for the future of SSGKC? (重)在中新广州知识城的规划建设中，新加坡人将管理经验带到广州，让这座城市平添了不少新加坡特色。专利审查中心已落户知识城，新加坡华中国际学校也将入驻，知识城未来将进一步与国际接轨。知识城快速发展改变周遭景观和生活面貌，对当地人产生什么影响？他们对知识城的未来有什么期许？.

Man Ting, Xiao Rong and the others go onboard the ship and find something amiss. They are ambushed by Alexis and shocked to learn that the drone carrying the virus is on the way towards Singapore… (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)(大结局)Alexis挟持可心及骑劫货船，威胁家明用病毒对新加坡展开恐袭。货船上，家明超控无人机向新加坡飞去。曼婷、晓荣等上货船检查，发现异样。Alexis先发制人展开袭击，还有恃无恐地指带有病毒的无人机已经飞去新加坡，曼婷等大惊……。.

programme.title: 老友万岁 Old Is Gold - EP 103
programme.desc: (R) Xiang Rong shockingly realises that Li E's date partner is Hugo, and thus firmly believes that Hugo is a love swindler. Li E and Hugo are dancing intimately in the dance studio, Xiang Rong and Xin Xin rushes in....... (PG)(重)向荣震惊发现丽娥的约会对象竟是Hugo，认定Hugo是爱情骗子。小白指丽娥曾经跟Hugo说过自己有多少家产，欣欣也猛然想起曾听到Hugo和人通电表示有财务问题，三人顿觉事态严重。丽娥和Hugo在舞蹈室亲昵起舞，向荣、欣欣冲入……。.

programme.title: 日出之食 Gourmet Breakfast - EP 1

(重)中国人的早餐，比一杯意式浓缩更加提神，在一把面中汲取故土情长，撒一撮辣椒激活勤劳本色。一缕晨光，一餐美食，每一日都不可辜负。我们将寻找，最壮美的中国日出，最地道的中国早餐，最可爱的中国人们。.

programme.title: 甘味人生 Taste Of Life - EP 245
programme.desc: Zhao Ju Cai and his wife Li Jin Xiu have five children. programme.title: 229明天见 29th February - EP 18

The two get introduced to Mr Zhu, the owner of a painting shop. Mr Zhu warns them that if they go back to 29th February, they may risk being erased from existence. (PG)(重)知新因得知自己不是正方的亲生子而意志消沉，幸好最后振作起来，与正方一起研究如何回去2月29日。两人经人介绍，找到开画店的朱老板。朱老板警告，若要回去的话，可能会有烟消云散、形神俱灭的风险….

programme.title: 我是媒体人 Beyond The Cameras - EP 9
programme.desc: A series of intensive trainings are lined up for DJ trainees, Sin Nee and Amos, including language skills, trailer writing, programme planning and interviews etc. During the trainings, their strengths and weaknesses become more obvious. Who among the both of them has the ability, and is better suited to be a radio DJ? Would the other trainee be able to catch up? Stay tuned! 自从电台DJ练习生歆霓和新豪报到后，一系列由多位资深DJ亲自指导的密集训练也随即展开！其中就包括了语言表达技巧、节目预告撰写、节目企划、广播剧训练、新闻播报与人物专访等等。过程中两人的优缺点渐渐显露出来，究竟谁更具实力？谁又在第一次跟班实习就迟到？敬请继续锁定！.

programme.title: 天空渐渐亮 Daybreak - EP 1
programme.desc: Zhang Tianliang and Zheng Weilong have been close friends since secondary school. Both of them often get themselves into trouble, and ended up being suspended from school. They were forced to be loanshark runners due to the debt Weilong owed, little did they know in the process, they indirectly caused the death of one of the debtor's wife, Wan An's mother, thus causing Wan An to bear a grudge against loanshark runners. (PG-些许暴力画面)(首播)张天亮和郑伟龙从中学起就是好友，两人经常打架闹事，被学校开除。因伟龙欠下大耳窿的钱，两人被迫当上跑腿，间接害死了一名欠债人的妻子，也就是婉安的母亲，但天亮却毫不知情，婉安因此对大耳窿跑腿深恶痛绝。天亮为帮一女子温书莹，犯下严重伤人罪，被判坐牢。出狱后他重新做人，当上律师。.

programme.title: 诡探 Detective Psycho - EP 30
programme.desc: Ba-ye is killed by Hanzhong when he refuses to hand over the seal to Hanzhong. Hanzhong tries to make Zhiquan the scapegoat. Zhiquan's son finally regains consciousness, but Zhiquan has to flee the city to avoid being arrested by the police. (PG13-部分画面令人不安)(大结局)八爷不肯把玉玺交给汉忠结果惹来杀身之祸。汉忠把八爷的死嫁祸给至全。至全终于盼到儿子苏醒，却因为必须跑路而再次离开儿子的身边。.

programme.title: 新方世玉 Hero Of The Times - EP 4
真的不一样 Fake It So Real - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) House bird nest is nest built in a man-made swiftlet house. Cave bird nest is nest built in the mountain caves or on cliffs. In this episode, Lee Teng will show audience what is bird nest, the harvesting process of house bird nests and cave bird nests in Malaysia and the difference between the two. (重)屋燕，是燕子在人工建造的燕屋内筑的巢。洞燕，是燕子在深山岩洞或悬崖峭壁筑的窝。在这一集节目里，李腾先带领观众认识什么是燕窝，接着前往马来西亚，深入了解屋燕和洞燕的采集过程，探讨这两种燕窝的不同之处。.

programme.desc: Xin Xin is forced to give up her position as the acting dean, Mei Fang finally gets what she wants, but Xin Xin pleads with Mei Fang to let her stay as a nurse as she cannot bear to leave, Mei Fang agrees, but continuously tries to find trouble for Xin Xin. Xin Xin takes matters into her own hands, Hugo shows his interest towards Xin Xin, Mei Fang asks Ping Pong to come on purpose, and the relationship between Xin Xin, Ping Pong and Hugo starts to become tense. (PG)欣欣被迫选择让出代院长之职，美芳终于得逞，但欣欣因为不舍得离开，要求美芳让她继续留下来当护士，美芳答应，却不断给欣欣难堪和麻烦。欣欣亲力亲为，Hugo表现对欣欣的好感，美芳故意把Ping Pong找来，让欣欣、Ping Pong和Hugo的关系陷入紧张。.

programme.title: 最家选择 No Place Like Home - EP 1
programme.desc: Young couples on the verge of marriage often have one major concern on their minds - a new flat. And they should. It's an important step but just how do they go about making that decision on the type of flat to buy? Is it really as simple as choosing between a BTO flat or a resale flat? Or do Ben and Chloe - an engaged couple, have many many other variables to take into account? (首播)正要结婚的新婚夫妇，必然会面对买房子的问题。到底该买一间BTO，还是买一间转售组屋呢？要买多大的房子？要住在那里？一连串的疑问，总会在脑海里浮现，挥之不去。就像这一集的Ben和Chloe一样，他们已经订婚了，并准备买一间房子。但和许多正要结婚的夫妇一样，他们发现还有许多因素他们必须考量。.

programme.title: 星期二特写 - 我就是我 Tuesday Report - Be Myself - EP 1
programme.desc: 27-year-old John Chung gave up his university in pursuit of his dream. After serving the nation for 2 years, John devoted his time and savings in building up his second-hand shoes and shoe polishing business. In 2018, he was in London to take part in the World Championships in Shoe Shining and was crowned the shoe shining champion of the year. After 6 years of hard work, John finally owns a retail shoe shop. He has a bigger dream to master the skills and become a professional bespoke shoemaker. 现年27岁的曾荏舜为了追逐梦想，放弃念大学。服完兵役后，他靠着微薄的积蓄投身于售卖二手皮鞋和擦皮鞋生意。潜心专研擦鞋技巧让他在2018年夺下了英国伦敦世界擦鞋比赛的冠军。打拼六年，曾荏舜终于有了自己的鞋店，每天西装笔挺为顾客擦鞋,零售皮鞋，开课传授擦鞋手艺，目前正迈向开创定制皮鞋的梦想迈进。.

programme.title: 天空渐渐亮 Daybreak - EP 2
programme.desc: Wan An is a new prosecutor in the office, dating Judge Wu Renxing who is currently filing for divorce with wife, Chu Lin. Wan An was publicly insulted as a third party by Chu Lin. Tianliang happened to witness the episode, and when Wan An who cannot get over what happened asked him on the definition of a third party, Tianliang explained it from a legal point of view that surprised Wan An. (PG)婉安当上检察官，与法官仁兴交往。仁兴正在办离婚，妻子楚琳当众羞辱婉安，指她是破坏别人家庭的小三，这一切被天亮目睹。婉安耿耿于怀，问天亮小三的定义。天亮从法律角度解释，指她不是小三，令婉安感意外。.

programme.title: 新方世玉 Hero Of The Times - EP 5
发现大丝路IV Discover The Great Silk Road S4 - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) "Discover The Great Silk Road" is a large-scale travelogue spanning the three continents of Europe, Asia and Africa. Follow the host Marco Liao as he starts his breath-taking journey from China's Xi'an through the Northern Silk Road to the path taken by Admiral Zheng He. (重)发现大丝路是一个横跨欧亚非三大洲的大型文化旅游节目，主持人廖科溢从中国西安出发，走过充满伊斯兰风情的北方丝路，穿越蜀身毒道，看见南方丝路文化，最后寻郑和下西洋的路线见证海上丝路的辉煌。.

programme.desc: (R) Zhao Ju Cai and his wife Li Jin Xiu have five children. Because of their father's pursuit of invention, the Zhao brothers' lives are about to change. (PG)(重)赵居财，一生致力研发酱油产品，与妻李锦琇育有五个孩子；居财虽然希望众孩子之中有人接手经營家业，但也尊重孩子们的兴趣和志向。赵家兄弟也因为父亲赵居财的「发明梦」，人生逐渐起了变化。.

programme.title: 前线追踪 Frontline - EP 28
programme.desc: (R) Speak Mandarin Campaign celebrates its 40th anniversary this year. How has the campaign evolved over the years? What are the possible directions to take this campaign further? (重)《讲华语运动》今年欢庆40周年。几经变迁，这项运动走过哪些里程碑？它对华族新加坡人带来什么影响？近几年，运动也着重在亲子间创造一个使用华文华语的环境。未来，这项运动还能如何发展？.

programme.title: 午餐吃什么 What's For Lunch? - EP 4

(重)在女权主义被强行抹黑的伊朗社会，地位平等是伊朗女性努力寻求的目标，妇女角色的转型是风向标，她们不再满足于只是作为妻子和母亲的角色。伊朗妇女为重获或改变自己的社会地位，在允许的条件内作出了相应的努力。.

programme.title: 爷爷的路 My Grandfather's Road - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) My Grandfather's Road aims to uncover even more roads in Singapore named after notable founding fathers and pioneers through their descendants. Through in-depth interviews, archive footages and show and tells, we will learn more about the country's past as well as the people who helped make Singapore the success that it is today. (重)《爷爷的路》的目的是发现更多以开国元勋和先锋而命名的马路。通过深入采访他们的子孙后裔、录像档案、演出和口述，让我们对国家的历史以及建国功臣们有更加深入的了解。.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 35
programme.desc: (R) Shimei and Shihao's father suddenly appears to demand for the income they received for appearing in the advertisement. He turns violent when Shimei and Shihao refuse to give him the money. Haixiu is knocked unconscious when she tries to protect Yuzhen from being beaten by Shimei's father. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)世美和世浩的父亲突然出现，表面上是要与他们团聚，实际上是觊觎他们的广告费。世美和世浩不肯给父亲钱，父亲大声吵闹，还对劝架的宇真挥拳。海秀为了保护宇真，自己被撞晕。.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 36
programme.desc: (R) Guixi says she does not agree to the relationship between Yuzhen and Yiyuan as Wancai is just a security guard. Wancai retaliates by saying that he also does not want to have anything to do with Guixi as she is rude and snobbish. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)贵熙说ONE’s食品的职员们都知道万才是公司大楼的警卫，非常丢脸，没办法跟郑家做亲家。万才指贵熙对他的家人无礼，又拿钱伤害他们，令他也一样不想跟高家做亲家。.

programme.title: 黑骑士 Black Knight - EP 20
programme.desc: (R) Sharon is dealt with a blow when she hears that Xiuhao has proposed to Haila. Bai Xi tells Sharon to make a wedding gown for Haila, but the latter refuses. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)雪伦从海拉姨妈的口中得知秀浩向海拉求婚，大受打击。白熙告诉要雪伦为海拉准备婚纱，但雪伦拒绝那么做。.

programme.title: 黑骑士 Black Knight - EP 21
programme.desc: (R) Xiuhao suffers severe headache and seeks Bai Xi's help. She reveals his past life's entanglements with Sharon and Haila. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)秀浩经常感到头疼。他向白熙请教，从而得知自己前世和海拉与雪伦有着爱恨纠缠的关系。.

programme.title: 最强大脑之燃烧吧大脑 第二季 Puzzle Masters S2 - EP 6
programme.desc: Hosted by Jiang Changjian, "Puzzle Masters Season 2" is a reality-cum-variety programme that showcases individuals with extraordinary brainpower. Wang Feng, Wei Kunlin and Bao Yun serve as team leaders. Qi Wei, Han Xue and Amber Kuo are the guests of the programme. 《最强大脑之燃烧吧大脑第二季》邀具备非凡脑力的天才上节目进行各项挑战，并以科学的方式分析各高手的能力。节目由蒋昌建主持，王峰、魏坤琳、鲍橒担任队长，戚薇、韩雪、郭采洁三位女嘉宾倾情加盟。.

programme.title: 我的契约老公吴先生 My Contracted Husband, Mr Oh - EP 31
programme.desc: Noticing Zuodou's expression when he is fixing Enzhao's gayageum, Shengzhu realizes that Zuodou prefers to return to the countryside to make gayageum. She suggests to Zuodou to return to the countryside as she worries Zuodou will not be happy in Seoul. She proposes they can maintain a long-distance courtship, with face to face meetings twice a week and calls twice daily. However, Shengzhu is too busy and often cannot fulfil the commitment. This disappoints Zuodou many times. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)胜珠见作斗替恩照修琴的表情，知道他还是喜欢回乡下做琴。因担心他为了自己留在首尔会不幸福，于是胜珠提议让作斗回乡下，和自己远距离恋爱，两人每周见面一次，每天打电话两次。但胜珠因工作太忙，常常无法照做，让作斗失望多次。.

programme.title: 我的契约老公吴先生 My Contracted Husband, Mr Oh - EP 32
programme.desc: Shengzhu's good friends knows that Shengzhu has decided to move to the countryside to live with Zuodou. All of them find her courageous. Zuodou knows Shengzhu has a tough time working in Seoul. He confesses his love to Shengzhu and they decide to get married. They have a warm wedding in the countryside which all their good friends attend. Shengzhu's mother and brother knows she is very happy when they see her joyful expression. (PG)(大结局)(双声道-中/韩)好友们知胜珠决定到乡下和作斗生活，都觉得她很有勇气。作斗知胜珠在首尔工作辛苦。他向胜珠告白，俩人决定结婚。他们在乡下办了一场温馨的婚礼，众好友们都来参加了。胜珠的母亲和弟弟见到胜珠开心的表情，知道她很幸福。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight

programme.title: 儿子的战争 Remember - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) Zhenyu capably wins the first trial. Renya feels doubt after seeing Zhenya vindicating the vice president of the Rihao Group. Renya speaks frankly to Zhenya after having some drinks. Zhenyu is very touched when he finds out the reason for Renya to become a prosecutor is to clear his father's name. (PG-些许性相关语)(重)(双声道-中/韩)振宇凭借出色的能力取得一审胜利，仁雅见他帮日浩集团副社长脱罪心存疑惑。仁雅醉酒后向振宇坦白心声，振宇得知仁雅成为检察官是为了替父亲翻案大受感动。.

programme.title: 异口同声 Who Is The Real Singer - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) Hosted by Chen Huan, Pop stars and impersonators face off to be the last one standing as the panel of singing judges try to determine the real singer by listening to their voices only. (重)由陈欢主持《异口同声》是一个大型猜评推理音乐节目，由陈欢主持。节目邀请乐坛代表性歌手讲述金曲背后故事，同时邀请模唱歌手用他们以假乱真的声线向专业猜评团发起挑战。专业猜评团由张宇、黄国伦、刘维、魏巡、马松、冯提莫组成。.

programme.title: 美食世家 2 Food Empire 2 - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Breakfast is, surely, the most important meal of the day. And Singapore has an inexhaustible list of breakfast items for early risers! Episode One hunts down 3 local favourites to kickstart the day! Let's rouse over butter cakes dunked in steaming coffee, scrumptious nasi lemak and flying pratas!

programme.title: 笔墨间的飨宴 A Literary Feast - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) Be it comfort food found in comics or the nostalgic taste of old Tokyo, the underlying spirit of these dishes are vividly personified in renowned Japanese literature. Host Youyi travels to Japan to have a taste of the dishes from classical and contemporary Japanese culture. (重)无论是漫画中传递温情的平凡菜肴，迎合都市快捷生活节奏的轻食，还是勾起回忆的浓浓古早味，日本历代文豪以精湛的文笔，捕捉食物的情意；借由笔墨让料理醇厚的味道持久留芳。这一集，主持人有懿透过味蕾，感受日式料理中蕴含的新旧文化。.

programme.title: 寻找原之味 Food Old Days - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) Singapore is heralded as the Food Paradise and Singaporeans' favourite pastime includes searching out for the best hawker and local cuisines in every corner on the island. However, many traditional food fares are now on the brink of vanishing. Many of these stall owners are either old or retiring and found no one to succeed their businesses even though they may be thriving. (重)新加坡号称美食天堂，新加坡人最喜爱的休闲活动之一就是全岛搜寻最好吃的熟食档、到全岛各角落品尝本地美食。然而，随着时代进步、空间变迁，许多传统美食因为后继无人而渐渐消失，许多传统做法因为科技而渐渐失传。.

programme.title: 寻医 A Medical Journey - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) In the Philippines, 3 babies are born per minute. Manila is now the world's most densely populated city and home to a 'baby factory hospital'. Joanna Dong enters the delivery wards to uncover unsettling issues - high teenage pregnancy rates and poor families burdened by too many mouths to feed. (重)在菲律宾每三分钟就有一名宝宝诞生。首都马尼拉目前已是全球人口最稠密的城市，政府妇幼医院更成为举世闻名的“婴孩工厂”。董姿彦发现，不节育、孩子生得过多，不但加重了医疗资源短缺，也延续了贫困的恶性循环。.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 37
programme.desc: (R) Yuzhen does not want his family to be humiliated by the Gaos anymore. He rejects the promotion in the hospital and also initiates a break-up with Yiyuan. Yiyuan has a falling-out with Guixi as she blames Guixi for affecting her relationship with Yuzhen. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)宇真不愿意父母一直对艺苑的家人低头，终于决定拒绝担任医院的外科主任，也向艺苑提出分手。艺苑怪贵熙导致她和宇真分手，警告贵熙别再插手她的人生，也别觊觎公司。两母女闹翻。.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 38
programme.desc: (R) While initially biased against Xizhen, Zhengshu changes her views about her when Xizhen impresses with her decorum. Yuzhen and Haixiu do volunteer work at a village. Yuzhen saves Haixiu when she almost drowns. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)政淑约见熙真。熙真的谈吐及为允灿说尽好话的一面令政淑对熙真刮目相看。宇真和海秀一起到农村去做义工。海秀为了救一名小孩，险些溺水，幸好宇真及时把她从水里救起。.

programme.title: 黑骑士 Black Knight - EP 22
programme.desc: (R) Sharon stabs Xiuhao when she is disappointed with his attitude towards her. Xiuhua sinks into a coma and recalls encounters with Haila in their past lives. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)(双声道-中/韩)秀浩彻底失望的雪伦一刀刺伤了他。昏迷中的秀浩，想起自己和海拉前世的画面。.

programme.title: 黑骑士 Black Knight - EP 23
programme.desc: (R) Xiuhao discovers a change in his body when he wakes up from his coma. Meanwhile, Sharon attempts suicide while on his way to the police station. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)秀浩清醒后发现自己体内的力量产生变化。雪伦在前往警察局的途中企图自杀。.

programme.title: 梦想的声音 3 Sound Of My Dream S3 - EP 11
programme.desc: A music variety where a number of talented singers, amateur or otherwise are given the chance to "challenge" a celebrity tutor by singing one of the celebrity's songs. In exchange, the celebrity is assigned one of four randomly selected songs and has three hours to come up with a cover performance of this song. 与上季相同，基本模式为星素挑战，由追梦歌手对导师发起讨教（挑战）。但在第三季开始，选歌模式已经更换为第一季的模式，可是选择权是由参赛者说“开始”的时候，只要喊“停”，那一首歌曲就是讨教老师要唱的歌。和第一季不一样的是，每一首歌都有关键词。如果进行第二轮讨教，是没有任何的关键词。时间也从之前的6个小时改成3个小时。据华少声称，如果“惊”曲榜里的歌曲原唱者是导师的话，讨教歌手若是选择原唱者导师，将会带来的难度和风险更大，最终导致讨教失败。这一季的歌手包括林俊杰，王嘉尔，胡彦斌，张靓颖，谭维维 等。.

programme.title: 我身后的陶斯 My Secret, Terrius - EP 1
programme.desc: Ailin is the mother of a pair of twins. She is normally busy taking care of her mischievous son and daughter. One day, her mischievous daughter accidentally knocks into her mysterious neighbour, Jin Ben, and they start to interact. Jin Ben grows curious about the mother who oddly knows much about his life and he keeps bumping into her whenever he goes out... (PG)(首播)(双声道-中/韩)爱麟是双胞胎妈妈，平日为了照顾一对淘气的儿女而忙碌。这天，因淘气儿女捣蛋的关系，不小心撞伤了住在隔壁的神秘新邻居金本，开始打交道。金本发现这位妈妈莫名其妙地相当了解他的生活，出门时又经常碰到她，开始对这位邻居感到十分好奇。。。。。。.

programme.title: 我身后的陶斯 My Secret, Terrius - EP 2
programme.desc: Jin Ben goes to a wake to investigate the death of Wen Chengzhu, who was the head of the National Security Department. He gets discovered by the NIS deputy director Quan Yingshi. Quan Yingshi recognises Jin Ben as the ex-agent code named "Terrius" and orders his men to hunt down Jin Ben. Jin Ben quickly shakes them off. While handling her husband's funeral arrangements, Ailin receives a call from her neighbour informing her that her twins have disappeared. She is in panics. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)金本到灵堂去调查国家保安室室长文成洙的死因时，不慎被国家情报院次长权英实发现了踪迹。权英实认出来金本就是代号为“陶斯”的前特工后命人,即刻加以追捕。金本遭到追踪，迅速逃跑。正当爱麟在办老公的后事时，接到邻居来电告知双胞胎失踪的消息，不禁陷入了恐慌之中。.

programme.title: 儿子的战争 Remember - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) Renya visits Zhenyu's newly opened law firm to congratulate him. Zhenyu tells her that he has applied for the retrial of Zaihe's case. Zhenyu believes his father can be vindicated this time as there is a witness to prove that Zaihe was not at the crime scene then. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)(双声道-中/韩)仁雅特地前来祝贺振宇的律师事务所开业。振宇向她表示已经申请四年前父亲载赫被冤枉的案子再审。因为有证人能证明父亲当初不在场，振宇相信这次会证明父亲是无罪的。.

programme.title: 料理的秘密 Food Secrets - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) There are various famous food in Korea. In recent years, Temple food, the new food trend is emerging. A nun who cooks temple food for her devotees and herself has caught the attention of Michelin chef! What is her food secret and what are the differences between temple food and plant-based diet? (重)在韩国有多不胜数的美食，而正悄悄崭露头角的却是源自寺庙的寺刹料理。有这么一位僧侣，她所做的料理甚至能让国外米其林厨师特地前往韩国品尝。究竟她的料理背后隐藏着什么秘密？而寺刹料理又与一般的素食有何不同？.

programme.title: 金星火星大不同 Mars Vs Venus - EP 17
programme.desc: (R) There is a limit to how much guys can dote on women. Is it really true doting men will bring about "Spoilt Women"? Ian Fang shares his own love story and imparts skills on how to dote on girlfriends! Let's see how the guests from Mars and Venus "fight" for their stand on this topic! (重)女人可以疼但不能宠，否则会持宠生娇！女人真的被宠就会变坏，变得不可理喻吗？方伟杰在节目中与大家分享自己的情史，同时还传授"宠女友"心得！男女嘉宾为了争"宠"而互相开炮，精彩绝伦；你绝对不能错过！.

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 68
programme.desc: (R) Yinghao is sued for compensation and his assets are seized temporarily. Xiuqing's family members have nowhere to go to. Zhenshu suggests that Shuzi and Meici stay with her for the time being. Shuzi and Meici agree as they do not have the means to source for a place to stay. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)公司对英鎬提出赔偿要求，英鎬的房子被查封，财产被假扣押。秀卿一家人没有地方住，真淑于是建议秀卿带着淑子和美慈跟她一起住。淑子和美慈原本拒绝，但最后因为真的无处可去，只好勉为其难地到真淑家去。.

programme.title: 奇怪的搭档 Love In Trouble - EP 25
programme.desc: (R) Zhixu decides to prosecute Xianxiu with an unusual rape charge with the intention to provoke Xianxiu into speaking the truth of his case. Xianxiu gets worked up in court under the provocation of Zhixu. He inadvertently reveals that he has murdered other persons and the location where he has hidden the murder weapon. (PG-些许性相关语)(重)(双声道-中/韩)为了刺激贤秀讲出案件的真相，智旭决定以特殊强奸罪起诉贤秀。贤秀在法庭上经不起智旭言语的一再刺激而变得暴躁，不经意地说出了自己杀害另外几人的事情和他隐藏做案凶器的地点。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 17
programme.desc: Knowing that Yunxue saved her husband, Zhiyuan informed her that she is hired as their company lawyer. When Zhiyuan saw Yunxue personally, she is stunned that Yunxue resembles Ruli. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)道英答应让尹雪来WID上班, 智媛打电话尹雪。当智媛看到尹雪后非常害怕, 因为眼前的女人与如莉长得一模一样。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 18
programme.desc: Zhiyuan suspects Yunxue is Ruli, so she hires someone to prove Yunxue's real identity. She did a DNA test with Yunxue and her mother's hair and the result reveals a genetic relationship. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)智媛怀疑尹雪从一开始就是故意接近自己家。她坚称尹雪就是如莉, 便私下派人调查尹雪的父母, 偷取她们的头发做DNA的检验。智媛得到的验证结果显示末年与尹雪是亲子关系。.

programme.title: 大话精 True Lies - EP 5
programme.desc: Aidan wakes up in the hospital where he learns that Xiao Hong has brain haemorrhage and needs to be operated on immediately. Aidan is guilt-ridden and wants to lie to save Xiao Hong's life when he suddenly remembers that the old lady warned him about losing something precious. He worries his lie will bring harm to Nadia and to De Hua. But when he remembers the bonds he built with Xiao Hong, he still decides to lie to save her... (PG)Aidan 醒来发现自己在病床，医生告知小红脑严重出血，须马上动手术。Aidan 自责心痛，想撒谎救小红，想起老太婆说的代价—会失去最珍惜的人。Aidan 担心会祸害德华和Nadia，内心挣扎。后闪忆和小红的父女情画面，决定撒谎救小红。.

programme.title: 花遊記 A Korean Odyssey - EP 21
programme.desc: Priestess A'si decides to make use of Devil King's soft spot for Demonic Lady to get him to capture Sanzang for her. Subsequently, Priestess A'si also threatens General Winter to obey her or she will get rid of Summer Fairy. (PG13-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/韩)阿斯女察觉魔王的弱点，决定利用魔王对罗刹女的思念指使魔王帮她得到三藏。接着，阿斯女还威胁冬将军，要他帮助她，否则把夏仙女除掉。.

programme.title: 求学地图 Schools Unlimited - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) Young people from all over the world are attracted to the United States to pursue their dreams. They work hard to create their own value in this foreign land. This episode, let us meet some Singaporean students and see how they have travelled all the way to the United States to pursue their dreams. (重)美国是一个吸引着世界各地年轻人追求梦想的地方。付出万般努力就为了能在这片土地上创造自己的价值，为未来埔路。这一集就让我们来看一看远赴他乡的几位新加坡学子，如何在美国一步一脚印的追逐他们的梦想。.

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 69
programme.desc: (R) Xiantai is suspicious of Zaiyong when he recalls that the police told him that Director Song last spoke to Zaiyong before his accident. Director Song confirms by blinking, that Zaiyong had ran him over with his car. Xiantai decides to work as Zaiyong's driver to look for the memory card in his car camera. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)贤泰突然想到之前警方说宋院长出车祸前最后跟载永通电话。贤泰怀疑载永跟车祸有关，询问院长。院长用眨眼的方式向贤泰证实是载永撞倒他的。贤泰为了查清真相，决定当载永的司机，以便寻找行车记录器里的录影。.

programme.title: 奇怪的搭档 Love In Trouble - EP 20
programme.desc: (R) Xianxiu's statement in the court vindicates Fengxi from the suspicion of murdering her ex-boyfriend. Everybody is happy for Fengxi, especially Zhixu. Fengxi rushes to her mother's work place and tells her the good news. Fengxi's mother is happy for Fengxi. (PG)(重)(大结局)(双声道-中/韩)鉴于贤秀在庭上的供述，终于让奉熙洗脱了当年杀害前男友熙俊的嫌疑，大家都为奉熙感到高兴，智旭更是露出了发自内心的笑容。奉熙迫不及待地去妈妈打工的地方，告诉了她这个好消息。奉熙的妈妈替女儿感到高兴。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 19
programme.desc: Zhiyuan is still suspicious of Yunxue and insists on firing her but Daoying refuses as Yunxue's mother, Monian, is holding a piece of land which he plans to acquire for development. Zhiyuan learns from Yunxue's parents that they have a lost twin daughter. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)道英反对智媛将尹雪辞退，因为尹雪妈妈拥有公司想要买的地皮。智媛不愿善罢甘休，她再次找到末年夫妇想打探关于尹雪的事情，末年说尹雪是双胞胎，但是在孩子百日的时候却弄丢了另外一个，智媛更加迷惑了。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 20
programme.desc: Wulie bought a necklace for Yunxue but the latter asked him to give it to Haizhu to please her. Yunxue secretly bought a similar necklace for herself. Haizhu flares up when she sees Yunxue wearing the same design necklace given by Wulie. Overwhelmed by suspicions of an affair between Yunxue and Wulie, Haizhu fainted. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)武烈给尹雪送了一条珍珠项链，但尹雪叫他拿回去讨好海珠。尹雪却偷偷私厎下购买一模一样的项链。海珠看到了将尹雪的项链生气得把它扯了下来，怀疑他们在一起，最后激动得晕了过去。.

programme.title: 笔墨间的飨宴 A Literary Feast - EP 9
programme.desc: From local egg tarts, braised delicacies to mala hotpot, which dish will leave a lasting impression? In this episode, Host Michelle Chia explores flavoursome dishes captured in the novels of 3 renowned female Hong Kong authors. 道地的蛋挞，醇香的卤味、独特的甜点、麻辣的火锅，究竟哪一种滋味是香港作家笔墨间最让人回味的料理？这一集，主持人谢韵仪探索了三位女作家笔下的香港美食，通过味觉去体会作家笔墨间所表达的情感。.

programme.title: 花遊記 A Korean Odyssey - EP 22
programme.desc: Devil King is injured when he tries to take on 99 punishments to stop Demonic Lady from going through reincarnation again. (PG13-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/韩)魔王为了让罗刹女不再承受轮回之苦，想独自接收99发惩罚罗刹女的煞气，结果中了寒毒后失明。八戒希望冬将军带着夏仙女到魔王的家把房子变得温暖些。阿斯女于是指使冬将军到魔王的家吧装有三藏的血的香炉拿给她。.

programme.title: 烧。卖 Served H.O.T. - EP 7
programme.desc: For the third challenge, they had to make Chendol. Fugui knew that Meiwei was very good at making Chendol and Tai Long would be of no match for her. Little did he know that Meiwei deliberately performed under her standards to lose to Tai Long, who also coincidentally made bad Chendol. 三个年轻人即将得到老字号南洋风味小吃店价值一百万的Laksa祖传秘方。他们是风雨同舟的兄弟：商业奇才庄浩伦（包勋评饰）、刀神陈欧文（方伟杰饰）和烹饪天才何泰龙（冯伟衷饰），合称“H.O.T”。三个前科犯准备接管生意，创造更好的生活。他们将遇到为厨师梦而孤军奋战的曾美薇（雅慧饰）、扬言破坏他们声誉的大厨Gordon（George Young饰）和破坏弟弟泰龙幸福的泰虎（李腾饰）。H.O.T之间的忠诚和成功将会因为过去的阴影而再次接受挑战。.

programme.title: 线人2 Fixer 2 - EP 7
programme.desc: Fortune is everywhere in Raub of Pahang, Malaysia and everyone is a millionaire there. The economic benfits are brought about by the Mao Shan Wang durians and durian farm owners in Sungai Klau have admitted that they have hit the jackpot. How can durian indulgence develop into a national industry? 马来西亚彭亨州的劳勿县仿佛遍地黄金，拿块石头随便丢，都可以砸到一个百万富翁。说的是榴梿猫山王带来的经济效益。双溪吉流的榴梿园主都自认押对了宝，吃榴梿从纯味蕾享受发展至国民产业，到底是怎样的一番风雨路？.

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 83
programme.desc: Ep 70: Bafeng finds Zaiyong's memory card in the office. Jia-en leads Bafeng to reveal where he has kept the memory card when Bafeng is drunk. She wants to pass the memory card to Xiantai in exchange for his love. When Xiantai rejects her advances, Jia-en goes to Zaiyong instead. Ep 70: 八峰在办公室里找一张记忆卡，发现是载永撞倒宋院长的，于是拿着记忆卡威胁载永。佳恩灌醉八峰，诱导他说出记忆卡藏在哪里。佳恩本来希望用记忆卡交换贤泰的感情，但贤泰拒绝跟她发展婚外情。佳恩于是投向载永。.

programme.title: 大力女都奉顺 Strong Girl Bong-Soon - EP 1
programme.desc: Fengshun passes by the construction site and witnesses the workers on the construction site beating a kindergarten school bus driver. In order to help the elderly driver, uses her mobile phone to call the police to stop the atrocity. A worker snatches her phone and throws it on the floor. They start fighting and Bong-soon ends up being arrested. 都奉顺路过工地，看到了工地上的工人在殴打一个开幼儿园校车的司机，为了帮助年迈的司机，她拿出了手机报警，想要阻止这场暴行。另一个工人抓住奉顺的手机把它扔在地板上。双方开打，奉顺被捉到警察局。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 21
programme.desc: As Haizhu wanted to test Yunxue's identity, she invited her for a seafood lunch. She knew that Ruli is allergic to seafood and ordered a feast of seafood before Yunxue arrived. Yunxue fainted after consuming seafood, and Daozi rushed her to the hospital. 海珠想到一个妙计判定尹雪到底是不是如莉,约尹雪一起吃饭。海珠知道真正的如莉对海鲜过敏，因此在尹雪来之前就已经点了大量的海鲜.用餐后,尹雪因严重过敏而晕了过去，道治急将尹雪送往医院。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 22
programme.desc: Wulie learns about Yunxue's allergy to seafood and her admission to hospital and deduces that Yunxue is Ruli. Yunxue lies to him that Ruli is her lost twin sister. Wulie is confused. Daozi expresses his affection for Yunxue. 武烈称呼尹雪为如莉，並说他已经在医院确认过她吃海鲜过敏之事，无可奈何下尹雪解释自己有一个双胞胎妹妹，因此才会有同样的反应，武烈再次陷入困惑。另一面，道治向尹雪表示爱意。.

programme.title: 寻医 A Medical Journey - EP 3
programme.desc: Childhood leukaemia or blood cancer takes at least 2-years to treat. Danny Yeo visits the only hospital in the capital city of Fujian province that provides specialized treatment and holistic care. For financially-strapped families, it's one of the last places to find hope towards complete healing. 中国大城市看病贵、看病难，但最好的癌症治疗集中此处。杨君伟陪白血病儿童家庭踏上求医之路，看举目无亲的他们如何在陌生城市安身治病。多亏社会力量，他们才能坚持漫长的抗癌斗争，等孩子痊愈，一起返乡。.

programme.title: 花遊記 A Korean Odyssey - EP 16
programme.desc: Ep 23: Shanmei contemplates summoning Wukong to help her when she realises that Priestess A'si is trying to switch their souls. However, Shanmei decides to do as Priestess A'si commands when she hears that Wukong may die if she were to summon him.Ep 24: General Winter says the only chance to switch Shanmei's soul back to her body is when Priestess A'si falls asleep. Wukong kisses Priestess A'si and transfers some medicine to her during the process, causing her to fall asleep against her wish Ep 23: 善美发现她的灵魂即将跟阿斯女的灵魂对调了，于是想召唤悟空帮忙。阿斯女向善美透露其实善美和悟空是必杀的缘分，若善美召唤悟空，那悟空很可能会丧命。善美为了保护悟空，决定代替阿斯女在石棺长眠。Ep 24: 冬将军说只要阿斯女睡着，就有机会把三藏的灵魂换回来。但阿斯女十分警惕，一直不肯睡着。悟空故意吻阿斯女，让她吞下一些药后睡着。.
